sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0900 ( DPOB_CD , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM , WHDG_TX_ISS_YR , CERTC_ISS_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_TX_ISS_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM_CPIS , WHDG_TX_ISS_PRPSE_CTNT , WHDG_TX_ISS_ISTUT_NM , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPY_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPBN_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_COD_T_N_DIV_CD , WHDG_TX_ISS_YN , WHDG_TX_ISS_DEL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #whdgTxIssNum# , #whdgTxIssYr# , #certcIssDivCd# , #systemkey# , #whdgTxIssDt# , #whdgTxIssNumCpis# , #whdgTxIssPrpseCtnt# , #whdgTxIssIstutNm# , #whdgTxIssAppyDt# , #whdgTxIssAppbnDt# , #whdgTxIssCodTNDivCd# , #whdgTxIssYn# , #whdgTxIssDelYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0900 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM=#whdgTxIssNum# , WHDG_TX_ISS_YR=#whdgTxIssYr# , CERTC_ISS_DIV_CD=#certcIssDivCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , WHDG_TX_ISS_DT=#whdgTxIssDt# , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM_CPIS=#whdgTxIssNumCpis# , WHDG_TX_ISS_PRPSE_CTNT=#whdgTxIssPrpseCtnt# , WHDG_TX_ISS_ISTUT_NM=#whdgTxIssIstutNm# , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPY_DT=#whdgTxIssAppyDt# , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPBN_DT=#whdgTxIssAppbnDt# , WHDG_TX_ISS_COD_T_N_DIV_CD=#whdgTxIssCodTNDivCd# , WHDG_TX_ISS_YN=#whdgTxIssYn# , WHDG_TX_ISS_DEL_YN=#whdgTxIssDelYn# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM=#whdgTxIssNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0900 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM=#whdgTxIssNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM , WHDG_TX_ISS_YR , CERTC_ISS_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_TX_ISS_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM_CPIS , WHDG_TX_ISS_PRPSE_CTNT , WHDG_TX_ISS_ISTUT_NM , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPY_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPBN_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_COD_T_N_DIV_CD , WHDG_TX_ISS_YN , WHDG_TX_ISS_DEL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0900 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM=#whdgTxIssNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM , WHDG_TX_ISS_YR , CERTC_ISS_DIV_CD , SYSTEMKEY , WHDG_TX_ISS_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM_CPIS , WHDG_TX_ISS_PRPSE_CTNT , WHDG_TX_ISS_ISTUT_NM , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPY_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_APPBN_DT , WHDG_TX_ISS_COD_T_N_DIV_CD , WHDG_TX_ISS_YN , WHDG_TX_ISS_DEL_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PAYR0900 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0900 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
WHDG_TX_ISS_NUM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
